name: Colossus
lore: A colossus is a towering construct of stone, metal, or similar materials, animated by powerful magic. Standing dozens of feet tall, these awe-inspiring automatons are built by mighty spellcasters or civilizations at the height of their power. A colossus might serve as a guardian of a city, a weapon of war, or the lasting monument of a forgotten empire. When its creator perishes or the magic sustaining it fades, a colossus might continue to follow its last commands for centuries, patrolling ruins long after the civilization that built it has crumbled to dust.

languages.notes: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance
traits.description: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The colossus has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiattack.description: The colossus makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +16, reach 15 ft. Hit: 36 (6d8 + 9) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the target has the Prone condition.

conditions.duration: until the creature ends the condition on itself

hit.additionalEffects: If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +16, reach 15 ft. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target has the Prone condition.

conditions.duration: until the creature ends the condition on itself

hit.additionalEffects: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Sunder
actions.description: The colossus strikes the ground, creating a shockwave. Each creature within 20 feet of the colossus must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) Bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

savingThrow.targets: each creature within 20 feet of the colossus
